purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 逻)
Pictophonetic: 羅 indicates the sound; 辶 (walk) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿺ Surround from lower left
    • 辶 [ chuò ] to walk; walking
    • 羅 [ luō ] gauze, net; to collect, to display
heisig_chinese_memo: A doctor walks down the road to work and to make the rounds patching up everyone with silk gauze.
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: A doctor walks down the road to work and to make the rounds patching up everyone with silk gauze.
humanum_full_description_en:
From "辵", " Luo " sound. The original meaning is patrol and inspection. "Shuowen Xinfu": "Luo, patrol. Congluo, Luo Sheng." Such as "Wei Shu. "Li Chuan": "Shixin Clan Zikai was a general in Longcheng town. He knew him secretly and set up a strict log. Then the birds and Xiao Yan made people." Du You of the Tang Dynasty "Tong Dian. "The Codex Alimentarius": "So Shulu was halved, and more than 800 hectares of land were reclaimed, which greatly benefited."

" Luo " is extended to mean soldiers on patrol. "Jade articles. "Roubu": "Luo, guerrillas." Such as Liang Shenyue in the Southern Dynasty "Song Shu. "Shen Tian Chuan": "The origin of the mountains and all logics, but also the province." Northern Song Ouyang Xiu and other "New Tang Book. "Li Mi Biography": "(Li) Mi Lei traveled into the customs, obtained by the logic, and escorted the emperor's office with the party branch." "Lei Xing" refers to secretly refitting.

" Luo " also means cover up. "Ji Yun. "Ge Yun": "Luo, cover also." For example, in the Northern Song Dynasty Huang Tingjian "Yan Ya": "Silkworms make cocoons to wrap themselves around, and spiders make nets to cover them."
humanum_short_description_en: From "辵", " Luo " sound. The original meaning is patrol and inspection.
humanum_full_description:
從「辵」，「羅」聲。本義是巡邏、巡查。《說文新附》：「邏，巡也。从辵，羅聲。」如北齊魏收《魏書．獠傳》：「始欣族子愷時為隆城鎮將，密知之，嚴設邏候，遂禽蕭衍使人。」唐代杜佑《通典．食貨典》：「於是戍邏減半，分以墾田八百餘頃，大獲其利。」

　　「邏」引申表示巡邏的士兵。《玉篇．辵部》：「邏，遊兵也。」如南朝梁沈約《宋書．申恬傳》：「緣山諸邏，並得除省。」北宋歐陽修等《新唐書．李密傳》：「（李）密羸行入關，為邏所獲，與支黨護送帝所。」「羸行」指秘密改裝而行。

　　「邏」還表示遮掩。《集韻．戈韻》：「邏，遮也。」如北宋黃庭堅〈演雅〉：「桑蠶作繭自纏裹，蛛蝥結網工遮邏。」
humanum_short_description: 從「辵」，「羅」聲。本義是巡邏、巡查。

Chinese: A doctor walks down the road to work and to make the rounds patching up everyone with silk gauze.
Meaning: make the rounds
Hanzi: 逻
Story: A doctor walks down the road to work and to make the rounds patching up everyone with silk gauze.
Kind: traditional

從「 辵 」，「 羅 」聲。本義是巡邏、巡查。《說文新附》：「邏，巡也。从辵，羅聲。」如北齊魏收《魏書．獠傳》：「始欣族子愷時為隆城鎮將，密知之，嚴設邏候，遂禽蕭衍使人。」唐代杜佑《通典．食貨典》：「於是戍邏減半，分以墾田八百餘頃，大獲其利。」 「 邏 」引申表示巡邏的士兵。《玉篇．辵部》：「邏，遊兵也。」如南朝梁沈約《宋書．申恬傳》：「緣山諸邏，並得除省。」北宋歐陽修等《新唐書．李密傳》：「（李）密羸行入關，為邏所獲，與支黨護送帝所。」「羸行」指秘密改裝而行。 「 邏 」還表示遮掩。《集韻．戈韻》：「邏，遮也。」如北宋黃庭堅〈演雅〉：「桑蠶作繭自纏裹，蛛蝥結網工遮邏。」
From " 辵", " Luo" sound. The original meaning is patrol and inspection. "Shuowen Xinfu": "Luo, patrol. Congluo, Luo Sheng." Such as "Wei Shu. "Li Chuan": "Shixin Clan Zikai was a general in Longcheng town. He knew him secretly and set up a strict log. Then the birds and Xiao Yan made people." Du You of the Tang Dynasty "Tong Dian. "The Codex Alimentarius": "So Shulu was halved, and more than 800 hectares of land were reclaimed, which greatly benefited." " Luo" is extended to mean soldiers on patrol. "Jade articles. "Roubu": "Luo, guerrillas." Such as Liang Shenyue in the Southern Dynasty "Song Shu. "Shen Tian Chuan": "The origin of the mountains and all logics, but also the province." Northern Song Ouyang Xiu and other "New Tang Book. "Li Mi Biography": "(Li) Mi Lei traveled into the customs, obtained by the logic, and escorted the emperor's office with the party branch." "Lei Xing" refers to secretly refitting. " Luo" also means cover up. "Ji Yun. "Ge Yun": "Luo, cover also." For example, in the Northern Song Dynasty Huang Tingjian "Yan Ya": "Silkworms make cocoons to wrap themselves around, and spiders make nets to cover them."

邏字的基本解释

邏
luó
见“逻”。

邏字的汉语字典释义

[①]［luó］
［《廣韻》郎佐切，去箇，來。］
“逻1”的繁体字。
(1)巡行；巡察。
(2)逻卒；巡行兵。
(3)遮拦。
(4)山溪的边缘。
(5)用同“捋”。参见“邏袖”。

邏字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【辵字部】　邏； 康熙笔画：26； 页码：页1267第36
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?郞佐切，羅去聲。【說文】巡也。【玉篇】游兵也。【正韻】游偵也。【晉書·戴洋傳】宜遠偵邏。　又【集韻】遮也。【正字通】山色環繞也。【杜甫詩】雲山紫邏深。　又【集韻】【韻會】朗可切【等韻】力可切，?羅上聲。又【集韻】良何切，音羅。義?同。

考證：〔【杜甫詩】春山紫邏長。〕　謹照杜甫送贾閣老出汝州詩原句改雲山紫邏深。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［luó］
["Guangyun" Lang Zuoqie, go to Xie, come. ]
The traditional characters of "Luo 1".
(1) To patrol; to inspect.
(2) Loggers; patrolmen.
(3) Blocking.
(4) The edge of the mountain stream.
(5) Use the same "stroke". See "Logo Sleeve".
